parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Excessive Corrosion of Hydraulic Brake Lines
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive corrosion of hydraulic brake lines can cause brake fluid leaks, leading to loss of brake function, accidents, and expensive repairs.
symptoms: Brake lines cracking and splitting
brake fluid leaks
corrosion on fuel lines and vehicle undercarriage.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake failure can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries. Brake pedal issues can make it difficult or impossible to stop the vehicle.
symptoms: Brake pedal feels soft or spongy
brake pedal sticks to the floor
brake pedal does not return to its normal position
brake pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
brake pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
vehicle is unable to stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake rotor and drum issues can cause loss of brake function, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: Brake rotors broken
brake drums cracked
grinding noise when brakes are applied
vibration when brakes are applied.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: ABS failure can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: ABS malfunction
left front wheel locked during panic stop
pulling or vibration when brakes are applied.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Hydraulic pump failure can cause loss of brake function, power steering failure, and accidents.
symptoms: Broken shaft on hydraulic pump
loss of brake function
power steering failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering gear box can cause loss of steering control, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Popping noise while driving
steering failure
inability to turn the steering wheel
loose or soft steering
jerking or unresponsive steering.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Overheating of the power steering fluid can cause the steering gear box to fail, leading to loss of steering control and accidents.
symptoms: Power steering fluid temperature exceeding 220-320 degrees
failure of the steering gear box
repeated replacements of the gear box.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake and Power Steering System Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake and power steering system can cause loss of braking and steering control, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Loss of braking and power steering
tensioner and serpentine belt disintegration
failure of the power steering pump
tight steering when applying brakes.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the idler arm can cause excessive tire wear and affect vehicle alignment, leading to loss of control and accidents.
symptoms: Excessive tire wear on the outside edge
worn-out idler arms
pulling wheel out of alignment.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The accelerator pedal sticking can cause unintended acceleration, loss of power, or difficulty braking, which can lead to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The accelerator pedal feels stuck or hard to press
the vehicle accelerates spontaneously
the vehicle fails to accelerate when needed
the accelerator pedal sticks to the floor
the vehicle surges forward unexpectedly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the throttle cable can cause unintended acceleration, loss of power, or difficulty braking, which can lead to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The throttle cable is frayed or damaged
the accelerator pedal sticks or is hard to press
the vehicle accelerates spontaneously
the vehicle surges forward unexpectedly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Problems with the throttle body can cause issues with acceleration, leading to difficulty braking or maintaining control of the vehicle.
symptoms: The engine check light comes on
the vehicle runs rough
the throttle body needs to be cleaned.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Improper connection of the throttle linkage can cause issues with acceleration, leading to difficulty braking or maintaining control of the vehicle.
symptoms: The throttle linkage is not connected correctly
the accelerator pedal feels stuck or hard to press.
